question: It is a newly discovered massive galaxy supercluster. It lies in the Stripe 82 of the Sloan Digital Sky Survey. It is about 4000 million light-years away from us. It is in the constellation of Pisces. It has been discovered by a team of astrophysicists from the Inter-University Centre for Astronomy and Astrophysics and Indian Institute of Science Education and Research led by J. Bagchi and colleagues in Pune, India. The name of the supercluster is _?
explanation: Saraswati Cluster is a newly discovered massive galaxy supercluster. It lies in the Stripe 82 of the Sloan Digital Sky Survey. It is about 4000 million light-years away from us. It is in the constellation of Pisces. It has been discovered by a team of astrophysicists from the Inter-University Centre for Astronomy and Astrophysics and Indian Institute of Science Education and Research led by J. Bagchi and colleagues in Pune, India.
